project_descr: Support the National Ozone Unit to monitor the activities and projects included in the Refrigerant Management Plan (RMP).

outputs.output_descr: This project will allow the National Ozone Unit to monitor the activities and projects included in the Refrigerant Management Plan (RMP) to ensure that the country meets its obligations under the Montreal Protocol for the Reduction of the consumption of chlorofluorocarbon refrigerant by 16 ODP tonnes (8 ODPtonnes/ per year), this in order to meet the montreaal protocol requirements for ODS consumption. SUR/REF/44/TAS/010.
